title: Dog Friendly 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Gold Coast, Available: 9/1/2022
posting_body: Spectacular Gold Coast two bedroom one bathroom just steps to Clark and Division Red Line features rehabbed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar, spacious living area, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms, great closet space, updated bathroom, laundry room in building, and pets are welcome!
Steps to shopping, nightlife, restaurants, and more!
Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 21269.
